name: Tiny Dinos - Builder (cc0)
description:
10k Tiny Dinos vibing on the omnichain.


Here is a collection of assets created as components with variants so that you can make your own dinos easily.


DUPLICATE file above and do whatever you want with it.


The NFT collection has a CC0 license, however Figma applies the also common CC BY 4.0 license which is also great but ensures the creators get credit.


----------------------------------------

  • Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format
  • Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.
  • Attribution — You must give the artist appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
